title: Sion is extremely strong! Don't listen to the crowd!
body:
Hi. Gold IV Sion main here to tell you that all these front page posts are from people that don't play him, or at least don't play him well. So what are Sion's main strengths and weaknesses?

Strengths {{item:3110}} (Blood is the wine of Victory)

• Very strong laning phase in most matchups, very safe in losing matchups such as riven or fiora
• Fairly easy to consistently land Q knockups in lane
• High base damage on Q and ult
• A properly timed W wins trades. 
• Some of the best TP ganks in the game against certain bot lanes
• Very good at applying pressure to the map
• Strong early, mid, and late
• A TON of CC
• Uses gold very well, still very strong even if behind
• Does very well when paired with someone else with strong lockdown ({{champion:111}} and {{champion:201}} are your best friends)
• Ult makes for some pretty crazy escapes 
• Can do a camp/ steal an enemy buff level one better than almost anyone
• Is a surprisingly good duelist

Weaknesses {{item:3069}} (Only cowards fear death)

• It can be difficult to hit a team with all their dashes off CD
• Every ability can be outplayed to some extent, although there are ways to circumvent this
• Lowest base health of any champion level 1
• Passive is very weak to the point where it almost never matters after about 8 minutes into the game
• If you mistime your ult, you are now in the center of the enemy team with no backup, similar to The Amumu Effect
• Struggles against team comps featuring tons of CC
• If your Q and ult are down you are now a lumbering hunk of meat with no way of getting close to people other than a paltry 40% slow

I can think of more if this post draws any attention. Just remember that just because someone says a champ/build/strategy/teamcomp is bad doesn't mean you have to believe them. Similarly, just because a champ is not played in the LCS doesn't mean it can't tear up solo que. It is your success that really matters. I was first drawn to Sion because I started watching [Sickmotion's](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=sickmotion) stream, who showed me how strong he could really be in the hands of someone who knew how to play him. 

Sion is love, Sion is life.

Hi, Diamond 5 Sion main here. 

I haven't liked laning with Sion since they nerfed his E and the speed you could detonate his shield, but I've been an avid Sion jungle player since he came out and still think he's a fantastic jungler that's overlooked for whatever reason. You stack tons of health in the jungle thanks to all the large monsters you're getting, he takes absolutely no damage jungling, his clear speed is great, and his lane ganks with ult are disgusting. Late game he's fantastic as a peeler but if you get ahead through ganking you can build him more damage focused with things like titanic hydra and black cleaver and really go ham. 

I think people just saw him repeatedly nerfed and stopped playing him, and while I do agree he's a fairly weak top laner thanks to his slow shield detonation now, people should really consider playing him jungle.
If you weren't playing Sion, you'd be plat already.
